snippet: Appearing to glorify a popular American entertainment icon is an unusual move for Pyongyang, which regularly unleashes invective at the United States.
abstract: North Korean state television runs taped footage of the country’s young leader, Kim Jong-un, at a concert that played a rendition of the Rocky theme song and showed clips of the pumped-up American film character boxing against his cold war rival Ivan Drago in Rocky IV; appearing to glorify a popular American entertainment icon is an unusual move for Pyongyang, which regularly unleashes invective at the United States.
lead_paragraph: Appearing to glorify a popular American entertainment icon is an unusual move for Pyongyang, which regularly unleashes invective at the United States.
